title: Ep. 792 - Hands Up, Don’t Nuke!
description:
President Biden drops a nuke comment in regards to gun rights while the government is using subtler weapons against us: turning the IRS against Christians, radical ideologies against our kids, and even ignoring the development of bioweapons under the State Department stewardship of Hillary Clinton.
My new book ’Speechless: Controlling Words, Controlling Minds,’ is now available wherever books are sold. Grab your copy today here: https://utm.io/udtMJ 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
